messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] DH,etc.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/10/00 7:46:04 PM Central Daylight Time, kworthen@mediaone.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/10/00 7:46:04 PM Central Daylight Time,
kworthen@... writes:

<< would someone
please explain the expression *runs with Scissors* to me? Every time I see
it all I can envision is something out of Edward Scissorhands. I'm sure it's
got some deep philosophical meaning I'm just missing. >>

Ann,
I put it in my sig line because it's sort of a philosophy for me. You know
all those maxims we all used to hear in childhood? Don't swim for an hour
after eating, don't make that face or it'll freeze like that, don't run with
scissors... It's my way of saying that I have always been an independent
thinker and always will be. I do it my way and if that means taking a little
risk, well, okay. It really isn't meant to be terribly serious at all - just
a humorous way of keeping my perspective.


*** KiM ***
runs with scissors
